name: Baldi s` Magic Calculator!
description:
Tired of math so much that you want to end the difficulties? Tottaly Real (but not a fact) Baldi's Magic Calculator CAN HELP YOU!

Solve math problems easier and faster than before with the multi-functional calculator, many options to solve problems and many options to not solve them! And plus secrets (to not be bored)! And so on, so on, ș̸̙͑͌̓̑o̷̢͕̟̓̾ ̷͔́́̊̉o̴͎̖̍n̸͈̘͛,̴̭̲̣͖́ ̴͙̌͝s̸̢̛͖̯̽̅o̴̫͊͠ ̸̳̺̤̑̌o̶̩̖͖̮͒̿n̵̤̗̻̏̀̎ͅ,̵̬̜͆͠ͅ ̸̖̟̜̞̕s̷̘̳͈̾õ̴̦̳̖̪͐ ̵͙̮̹̻̊͝ò̵̩̖n̴͙̖̍̍, so on, so on!
